response.overview: An animated film from children, to children... A child, like any other — sibling by her side, a roof overhead, a warm table, a school, a toy in hand… But one day, her words are stolen, her colours fade, and her kite is swept away. Yet, in far-off corners of the world, children rise and dream as one. Under the olive trees, they find words to multiply, pages to paint, letters to send — a chorus of hope, woven to be shared.
response.title: Dreams under the Olive Trees
